data.text:
Eminem’s former wife, Kimberly Anne Scott, is an American freelance illustrator and author. She fell into the limelight after her marriage to the famous American rapper Eminem. Their strained relationship often caused hiccups, but the loving bond they shared was able to sustain their relationship for around 20 years.

Just recently, Kimberly was in the spotlight following a media charade fueled by her ex-husband. She often tried to kill herself, but is it worth it? She was spat on the stage and made to become an object of ridicule by Eminem.

Have you wondered what is Kim’s story and what is her history with the famous rapper? Well… check out everything you need to know about Kim below.

Kimberly Anne Scott – Bio

Eminem’s former wife was born in January 1975 in Warren Michigan, United States. She was one of two children of Kathleen Sluck and her husband, Casmir. She had her second half, her twin sister named Dawn Scott and they were raised by their mother Kathleen and stepfather.

His father’s name was Casmir Sluck.being an alcoholic. He often abused and abused his wife and children whenever he was very drunk, which affected the upbringing of their children, Kim and her sister Dawn.

Kim and her twin sister attended Lincoln High School where she met Field Marshal Bruce Mathers III now known by his stage name Eminem. At the time, Eminem had just started his rapping career. He was 15 and Kim was 13.

How did Kim and Eminem meet?

The duo met at a mutual friend’s house. Eminem was rapping on the table, LL Cool J’s hit song “I’m Bad,” and his booty managed to capture Kim’s heart who fell in love instantly.

After a while, the young lovers started dating, and this led to Kim and her sister Dawn leaving their home to live with Eminem. The rapper’s mother, Debbie Mathers-Briggs, however, accepted Kim and her sister and took care of them all, after hearing the story of their constant abuse from their father.

With greater responsibility, Eminem found work in St. Claire Shores as a bartender, a job he combined with his career as a rapper. He was often involved in many rap battles in St. Clair and one day he caught the eye of Marky Bass who was a local producer at the time. Marky was determined to help Eminem reach a peak in his career.

However, the young rapper was about to take his career to the next level, when Kim found himself pregnant and fell pregnant with Eminem’s child. This threatened the rapper’s career and led to a rift in the relationship between the young lovers who were still struggling at that time.

Despite the hardships he was facing at the time, Eminem tried to give their child a better life, resolving to work very hard for the sake of his child which almost ended his rapping career.

Personal life: Parker Scott, husband, children and family

Talking about the private life of Kimberly Anne ScottIn his life, he always talked about his relationship with Eminem, and the duo had intimate relations. The young couple welcomed their first baby, Hailie Jade Mathers, on December 25, 1995. Hailie’s arrival increased the couple’s responsibility, leading to a series of issues that led to a breakup in 1996.

After their separation, the couple went theirdifferent paths. Kim left with their daughter while Eminem returned to his mother. Despite being away for more than two years, the couple managed to reconcile and get back together in 1999, they also bonded at St. Joseph Mo the same year.

The marriage only lasted two years before they divorced in 2001. However, five years after their divorce, the couple again settled their differences and married for the second time in January 2006. Much to the surprise of all, the second marriage ended after three months.

Prior to their second marriage, Kim was in other relationships including Eric Hatter with whom she had a child named Whitney Scott. Whitney was born in 2002 and adopted by Eminem in 2005. Kim and Eminem also adopted Dawn Scott’s daughter, Alaina Scott, after her twin sister died of a heroin overdose in 2016.

Just for the records, Kimberly Ann Scott had three biological children, including Hailie Jade Mathers, Whitney Scott and Parker Scott, and she adopted Alaina Scott, the daughter of her twin sister.

life after divorce

After the second divorce from Eminem, life became unbearable as Kim had done so much to end her life and her misery.

She was reportedly charged with cocaine possession in 2003, fined and kept on probation, which ultimately resulted in a one-month jail term after violating her probation.

Similarly, in 2015, going through depression following the abuse of her ex-husband; Kim attempted suicide by crashing her car into a pole after being heavily intoxicated. Eminem’s ex-wife, however, admitted the crime was intentional, you definitely lose friends, but the pain comes when you realize you have no one to talk to, that was the position of Kim.

On a lighter note, Kimberly Anne Scott having been through all sorts of relationship issues has also accomplished a lot to be a good mother and her kids are testaments to that fact. Despite everything that happened, she always wanted the best for her children and today they are doing well in their chosen career.

Kimberly Anne Scott Net Worth

The ex-wife of American rapper Eminem has an estimated net worth of $2 million in 2017 and has worked in many places, including children’s books, greeting cards and more.
